import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./ordercards.css"; import { Row, Col, Dropdown, DropdownButton,Modal ,Button } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function OrdersCards(props) { const [modalShow,setModalShow]=useState(false) const styles={ backgroundColor:" var(--primary-2) !important", border:" var(--primary-2) !important", width: "inherit !important" } return (
{props.orders.order_category}

ID:{props.orders.order_id}

{props.orders.product_name}

{props.orders.brand}

Quantity:{props.orders.quantity}

 Buyer Details Payment Payment Method Payment Status Payment Details Buyer Type Buyer Name Buyer Address Shipping Shipping Details Delivery Type Shipping Carrier

{props.orders.popularity}

 {/* confrim */} setModalShow(false)} className="cancel-modal">
Schedule a Meet Schedule a meet with the customer care for further help.
Click on Open App to schedule the meet's date and time
); }
